name: CyberRunner (itch) (jkong22pc)
description:
CyberRunner

CONTROLS:

Move: Arrow Keys / WASD

Jump: Space

Skip Level: P

TIPS:

To complete a level reach the pinwheel pole.

You get one double jump that refreshes once you hit the ground. 

Levels may be very challenging. Use the 'P' key to skip a level if needed.
